trans-unit.source: Warning: If the matrix A does not have the properties listed in the opts structure then the result will not be accurate AND no warning will be given. When in doubt, let Octave examine the matrix and choose the appropriate solver as this step takes little time and the result is cached so that it is only done once per linear system.
trans-unit.target: 警告：如果矩阵 A 不具有 opts 结构中列出的属性，则结果将不准确，并且不会给出警告。如有疑问，请让Octave检查矩阵并选择适当的求解器，因为此步骤花费的时间很少，并且结果被缓存，因此每个线性系统仅执行一次。

trans-unit.source: Warning: You may need to clear name before the new definition is available. If you are editing a .cc file, you will need to execute mkoctfile name.cc before the definition will be available.
trans-unit.target: 警告：在新定义可用之前，您可能需要清除 name 。如果您正在编辑.cc文件，则需要执行 mkoctfile name.cc 在定义可用之前。

trans-unit.source: Warning: leap seconds are ignored. A table of leap seconds is available on the Wikipedia entry for leap seconds.
trans-unit.target: 警告： leap秒将被忽略。leap秒表可在Wikipedia条目上获得。

trans-unit.source: Warning: the truth value of an empty matrix is always false, see the previous list item for details.
trans-unit.target: 警告：空矩阵的真值始终为 false ，有关详细信息，请参见上一个列表项。

trans-unit.source: Warning: there is one exception to the rule of evaluating all (boolean1(:)), which is when boolean1 is the empty matrix. The truth value of an empty matrix is always false so [] && true evaluates to false even though all ([]) is true.
trans-unit.target: 警告：计算 all (boolean1(:)) 值（boolean1（:)）的规则有一个例外，即 boolean1 是空矩阵。空矩阵的真值始终为 false ,因此即使 all ([]) 均为 true ， [] && true 计算结果仍为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Warning:functions is provided for debugging purposes only. Its behavior may change in the future and programs should not depend on any particular output format.
trans-unit.target: 警告：提供的 functions 仅用于调试目的。将来它的行为可能会更改，并且程序不应依赖于任何特定的输出格式。

trans-unit.source: You should not change the files in /usr/include. You can find the gcc include directory tree by running the command
trans-unit.target: 您不应该在以下位置更改文件 / usr / include。您可以通过运行以下命令找到 gcc 包含目录树

trans-unit.source: A can be either a square (preferably sparse) matrix or a function handle, inline function or string containing the name of a function which computes A * x. In principle A should be symmetric and non-singular; if pcr finds A to be numerically singular, you will get a warning message and the flag output parameter will be set.
trans-unit.target: A 可以是正方形（最好是稀疏的）矩阵或函数句柄，内联函数或包含计算 A * x 的函数名称的字符串。原则上， A 应该是对称且非奇异的；如果 pcr 发现 A 在数字上是奇数，则将收到警告消息，并且将设置 flag 输出参数。

trans-unit.source: A can be passed as a matrix or as a function handle or inline function f such that f(x, "notransp") = A*x and f(x, "transp") = A'*x.
trans-unit.target: A 可以作为矩阵或函数句柄或内联函数 f 传递，这样 f(x, "notransp") = A*x 和 f(x, "transp") = A'*x 。

trans-unit.source: A has to be Hermitian and Positive Definite (HPD). If pcg detects A not to be positive definite, a warning is printed and the flag output is set.
trans-unit.target: A 必须是Hermitian和正定（HPD）。如果 pcg 检测到 A 不是肯定的，则打印警告并设置 flag 输出。

trans-unit.source: <var>A</var> is general rectangular (currently makes no difference)
trans-unit.target: <var>A</var> 是普通矩形（当前没有区别）

trans-unit.source: <var>A</var> is lower triangular
trans-unit.target: <var>A</var> 是下三角

trans-unit.source: <var>A</var> is positive definite
trans-unit.target: <var>A</var> 为正定

trans-unit.source: <var>A</var> is symmetric or complex Hermitian (currently makes no difference)
trans-unit.target: <var>A</var> 是对称的或复杂的埃尔米特式（目前没有区别）

trans-unit.source: <var>A</var> is the adjacency matrix of the array to be plotted and <var>xy</var> is an <var>n</var>-by-2 matrix containing the coordinates of the nodes of the graph.
trans-unit.target: <var>A</var> 是要绘制的数组的邻接矩阵， <var>xy</var> 是包含图节点的坐标的 <var>n</var> ×2矩阵。

trans-unit.source: A is the matrix of the linear system and it must be square. A can be passed as a matrix, function handle, or inline function Afun such that Afun (x, "notransp") = A * x and Afun (x, "transp") = A' * x. Additional parameters to Afun may be passed after x0.
trans-unit.target: A 是线性系统的矩阵，它必须是正方形。 A 可以作为矩阵，函数句柄或内联函数 Afun 传递,这样 Afun (x, "notransp") = A * x 和 Afun (x, "transp") = A' * x 。可以在 x0 之后传递给 Afun 的其他参数。

trans-unit.source: A is the matrix of the linear system and it must be square. A can be passed as a matrix, function handle, or inline function Afun such that Afun(x) = A * x. Additional parameters to Afun may be passed after x0.
trans-unit.target: A 是线性系统的矩阵，它必须是正方形。 A 可以作为矩阵，函数句柄或内联函数 Afun 传递,这样 Afun(x) = A * x 。可以在 x0 之后传递给 Afun 的其他参数。

trans-unit.source: <var>A</var> is upper Hessenberg (currently makes no difference)
trans-unit.target: <var>A</var> 是上位的Hessenberg（目前没有影响）

trans-unit.source: <var>A</var> is upper triangular
trans-unit.target: <var>A</var> 是上三角

trans-unit.source: <var>C</var> contains the points of the Voronoi facets. The list <var>F</var> contains, for each facet, the indices of the Voronoi points.
trans-unit.target: <var>C</var> 包含Voronoi构面的点。列表 <var>F</var> 包含每个方面的Voronoi点的索引。

trans-unit.source: M1, M2 are the preconditioners. The preconditioner M is given as M = M1 * M2. Both M1 and M2 can be passed as a matrix or as a function handle or inline function g such that g (x, "notransp") = M1 \ x or g (x, "notransp") = M2 \ x and g (x, "transp") = M1' \ x or g (x, "transp") = M2' \ x. If M1 is omitted or empty, then preconditioning is not applied. The preconditioned system is theoretically equivalent to applying the bicg method to the linear system inv (M1) * A * inv (M2) * y = inv (M1) * b and inv (M2') * A' * inv (M1') * z = inv (M2') * b and then setting x = inv (M2) * y.
trans-unit.target: M1 ， M2 是前提条件。前置条件 M 为 M = M1 * M2 。既 M1 和 M2 可以作为基质或作为功能句柄或内联函数被传递 g 使得 g (x, "notransp") = M1 \ x 或 g (x, "notransp") = M2 \ x 和 g (x, "transp") = M1' \ x 或 g (x, "transp") = M2' \ x 。如果 M1 省略或为空，则不应用预处理。预处理系统在理论上等同于将 bicg 方法应用于线性系统 inv (M1) * A * inv (M2) * y = inv (M1) * b 和 inv (M2') * A' * inv (M1') * z = inv (M2') * b ，然后设置 x = inv (M2) * y 。

trans-unit.source: R1’*R1 = R’*R + u*u’ if op is "+"
trans-unit.target: R1 '* R1 = R '* R + u * u '如果 op 为 "+"

trans-unit.source: R1’*R1 = R’*R - u*u’ if op is "-"

trans-unit.source: <var>T</var> is typically the output of a Delaunay triangulation of a 3-D set of points. Every row of <var>T</var> contains four indices into the n-by-3 matrix <var>X</var> of the vertices of a tetrahedron. Every row in <var>X</var> represents one point in 3-D space.
trans-unit.target: <var>T</var> 通常是3D点集的Delaunay三角剖分的输出。 <var>T</var> 的每一行都包含四个指向四面体顶点的n×3矩阵 <var>X</var> 的索引。 <var>X</var> 中的每一行代表3-D空间中的一个点。

trans-unit.source: a and b are the lower and upper limits of integration. Either or both limits may be infinite or contain weak end singularities. If either or both limits are complex, integral will perform a straight line path integral. Alternatively, a complex domain path can be specified using the "Waypoints" option (see below).
trans-unit.target: a 和 b 是积分的下限和上限。这两个限制中的一个或两个可能是无限的，或者包含弱的末端奇点。如果其中一个或两个限制都很复杂，则 integral 将执行直线路径积分。或者，可以使用 "Waypoints" 选项指定一个复杂的域路径（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: cmember is an optional vector of length n. It defines the constraints on the column ordering. If cmember(j) = c, then column j is in constraint set c (c must be in the range 1 to n). In the output permutation p, all columns in set 1 appear first, followed by all columns in set 2, and so on. cmember = ones (1,n) if not present or empty. ccolamd (S, [], 1 : n) returns 1 : n
trans-unit.target: cmember 是长度为n的可选向量。它定义了列顺序的约束。如果 cmember(j) = c ，则列 j 在约束集 c 中（ c 必须在1到n的范围内）。在输出排列 p 中，集合1中的所有列首先出现，然后出现集合2中的所有列，依此类推。 cmember = ones (1,n) 如果不存在或为空）。 ccolamd (S, [], 1 : n) 返回 1 : n

trans-unit.source: cmember is an optional vector of length n. It defines the constraints on the ordering. If cmember(j) = S, then row/column j is in constraint set c (c must be in the range 1 to n). In the output permutation p, rows/columns in set 1 appear first, followed by all rows/columns in set 2, and so on. cmember = ones (1,n) if not present or empty. csymamd (S,[],1:n) returns 1:n.
trans-unit.target: cmember 是长度为n的可选向量。它定义了排序的约束。如果 cmember(j) = S ，则行/列j在约束集 c 中（ c 必须在1到n的范围内）。在输出排列 p 中，组1中的行/列首先出现，然后是组2中的所有行/列，依此类推。 cmember = ones (1,n) 如果不存在或为空）。 csymamd (S,[],1:n) 返回 1:n 。

trans-unit.source: code must be in the form of a string that is passed to the Octave interpreter via the evalin function, i.e., a (quoted) string constant or a string variable.
trans-unit.target: code 必须采用通过 evalin 函数传递给Octave解释器的字符串的形式，即（引用的）字符串常量或字符串变量。

trans-unit.source: coefs may also be a multi-dimensional array, specifying a vector-valued or array-valued polynomial. In that case the polynomial order m is defined by the length of the last dimension of coefs. The size of first dimension(s) are given by the scalar or vector d. If d is not given it is set to 1. In this case p(r, i, :) contains the coefficients for the r-th polynomial defined on interval i. In any case coefs is reshaped to a 2-D matrix of size [ni*prod(d) m].
trans-unit.target: coefs 也可以是多维数组，指定向量值或数组值多项式。在这种情况下，多项式阶数 m 由 coefs 的最后维度的长度定义。第一维的大小由标量或向量 d 给出。如果未给出 d ,则将其设置为 1 。在这种情况下， p(r, i, :) 包含在间隔 i 上定义的第 r 个多项式的系数。在任何情况下，都将 coefs 重塑为尺寸为 [ni*prod(d) m] ni * prod（ d ）的二维矩阵 m ]。

trans-unit.source: collapsedelimiters which may take the value of true (default) or false.
trans-unit.target: collapsedelimiters ，其值可以为 true （默认）或 false 。

trans-unit.source: <var>condition</var> is an expression that controls what the rest of the statement will do. The <var>then-body</var> is executed only if <var>condition</var> is true.
trans-unit.target: <var>condition</var> 是一个表达式，用于控制语句其余部分的工作。仅当 <var>condition</var> 为true时， <var>then-body</var> 才会执行。

trans-unit.source: condition is any Octave expression that can be evaluated in the code context that exists at the breakpoint. When the breakpoint is encountered, condition will be evaluated, and execution will stop if condition is true. If condition cannot be evaluated, for example because it refers to an undefined variable, an error will be thrown. Expressions with side effects (such as y++ > 1) will alter variables, and should generally be avoided. Conditions containing quotes (‘
trans-unit.target: condition 是可以在断点处存在的代码上下文中求值的任何Octave表达式。遇到断点时，将评估 condition ，如果 condition 为真，则执行将停止。如果无法评估 condition （例如，因为它引用了未定义的变量），则将引发错误。具有副作用（例如 y++ > 1 ）的表达式将更改变量，通常应避免使用。包含引号（'

trans-unit.source: copies is an optional input indicating whether a new figure should be created ("new") or whether an existing figure may be reused ("reuse"). An existing figure may be reused if the "FileName" property matches the specified input filename. When a figure is reused it becomes the active figure and is shown on top of other figures. If the figure was offscreen, it is re-positioned to be onscreen. The default value for copies is "new".
trans-unit.target: copies 是一个可选输入，指示是否应创建新图形（ "new" ）或是否可以重用现有图形（ "reuse" ）。如果 "FileName" 属性与指定的输入 filename 匹配，则可以重新使用现有图形。重用图形后，它将变为活动图形，并显示在其他图形之上。如果人物不在屏幕上，则将其重新放置在屏幕上。为默认值 copies 是 "new" 。

trans-unit.source: <var>count</var> is a vector with the lengths of each repeated value.
trans-unit.target: <var>count</var> 是具有每个重复值长度的向量。

trans-unit.source: <var>count</var> is the number of nonzeros in each column, <var>mean</var> is the mean of the nonzeros in each column, and <var>var</var> is the variance of the nonzeros in each column.
trans-unit.target: <var>count</var> 是每列中非零的数量， <var>mean</var> 是每列中非零的均值，而 <var>var</var> 是每列中非零的方差。

trans-unit.source: <var>d</var> is a serial date number or a date string.
trans-unit.target: <var>d</var> 是序列号或日期字符串。

trans-unit.source: <var>data</var> must be a non-singleton 3-dimensional matrix. The smoothed data from this matrix is returned in <var>smoothed_data</var> which is of the same size as <var>data</var>.
trans-unit.target: <var>data</var> 必须是非单3维矩阵。来自此矩阵的平滑数据以 <var>smoothed_data</var> 返回，该 <var>data</var> 大小与data相同。

trans-unit.source: <var>data</var> must be a single object which means it is usually preferable for it to be a data container such as a cell array or struct so that additional data items can be added easily.
trans-unit.target: <var>data</var> 必须是单个对象，这意味着通常最好将其作为数据容器，例如单元格数组或结构，以便可以轻松添加其他数据项。

trans-unit.target: <var>data</var>/index.html

trans-unit.source: date is a serial date number (see datenum), a date vector (see datevec), or a string or cell array of strings. In the latter case, it is passed to datevec to guess the input date format.
trans-unit.target: date 是序列日期号（请参阅 datenum ），日期向量（请参见 datevec ）或字符串或字符串单元格数组。在后一种情况下，它将传递给 datevec 以猜测输入的日期格式。

trans-unit.source: delimiter The character separating columns of data. Use \t for tab. (Only valid for ASCII files)
trans-unit.target: delimiter 数据列的字符。使用 \t 作为标签。（仅对ASCII文件有效）

trans-unit.source: delimitertype which may take the value of "simple" (default) or "regularexpression". A simple delimiter matches the text exactly as written. Otherwise, the syntax for regular expressions outlined in regexp is used.
trans-unit.target: delimitertype ，其值可以为 "simple" （默认值）或 "regularexpression" 。一个简单的定界符与文本完全匹配。否则，将使用 regexp 中概述的正则表达式语法。

trans-unit.source: eigest returns the estimate for the smallest eigest(1) and largest eigest(2) eigenvalues of the preconditioned matrix P = m \ A. In particular, if no preconditioning is used, the estimates for the extreme eigenvalues of A are returned. eigest(1) is an overestimate and eigest(2) is an underestimate, so that eigest(2) / eigest(1) is a lower bound for cond (P, 2), which nevertheless in the limit should theoretically be equal to the actual value of the condition number.
trans-unit.target: eigest 返回估计最小 eigest(1) 和最大 eigest(2) 的预调节的矩阵的特征值 P = m \ A 。特别地，如果不使用预处理，则返回 A 的极限特征值的估计值。 eigest(1) 是高估，而 eigest(2) 是低估，因此 eigest(2) / eigest(1) 是 cond (P, 2) P ，2）的下限，但从理论上讲，该限制应等于条件编号的实际值。

trans-unit.target: <var>err</var> （标量）

trans-unit.target: <var>err</var> （向量或矩阵）

trans-unit.source: <var>err</var> contains an estimate of the error in the solution.
trans-unit.target: <var>err</var> 包含对解决方案中的错误的估计。

trans-unit.source: err is a structure that must contain at least the "message" and "identifier" fields. err can also contain a field "stack" that gives information on the assumed location of the error. Typically err is returned from lasterror.
trans-unit.target: err 是一种结构，必须至少包含 "message" 和 "identifier" 字段。 err 还可以包含一个字段 "stack" ，该字段提供有关错误的假定位置的信息。通常 err 从 lasterror 返回。

trans-unit.source: err is an approximate bound on the error in the integral abs (q - I), where I is the exact value of the integral.
trans-unit.target: err 是积分 abs (q - I) 的误差的近似边界，其中 I 是积分的精确值。

trans-unit.source: <var>err</var> is an estimate of the absolute integration error.
trans-unit.target: <var>err</var> 是绝对积分误差的估计。

trans-unit.source: <var>event</var> contains event data that will be ignored. This construct facilitates a call to movegui from a callback.
trans-unit.target: <var>event</var> 包含将被忽略的事件数据。这种构造有助于从回调中调用movegui。

trans-unit.source: extrap is a scalar number. It replaces values beyond the endpoints with extrap. Note that if extrap is used, method must be specified as well. If extrap is omitted and the method is "spline", then the extrapolated values of the "spline" are used. Otherwise the default extrap value for any other method is "NA".
trans-unit.target: extrap 是一个标量数。它用 extrap 替换端点之外的值。请注意，如果 extrap 使用， method 必须被指定为好。如果 extrap 被省略，并且 method 是 "spline" ，那么外推值 "spline" 被使用。否则，默认 extrap 任何其他数值 method 是 "NA" 。

trans-unit.source: extrapval is a scalar number. It replaces values beyond the endpoints with extrapval. Note that if extrapval is used, method must be specified as well. If extrapval is omitted and the method is "spline", then the extrapolated values of the "spline" are used. Otherwise the default extrapval value for any other method is "NA".
trans-unit.target: extrapval 是一个标量数。它用 extrapval 替换端点之外的值。请注意，如果 extrapval 使用， method 必须被指定为好。如果 extrapval 被省略，并且 method 是 "spline" ，那么外推值 "spline" 被使用。否则，默认 extrapval 任何其他数值 method 是 "NA" 。

trans-unit.source: <var>f</var> can be an integer which corresponds to one of the codes in the table below, or a date format string.

trans-unit.source: f is a function handle, inline function, or a string containing the name of the function to evaluate. The function must have the form y = f (x) where y and x are scalars.
trans-unit.target: f 是函数句柄，内联函数或包含要评估的函数名称的字符串。该函数的形式必须为 y = f (x) ，其中 y 和 x 是标量。

trans-unit.source: f is a function handle, inline function, or string containing the name of the function to evaluate. quadv is a vectorized version of quad and the function defined by f must accept a scalar or vector as input and return a scalar, vector, or array as output.
trans-unit.target: f 是函数句柄，内联函数或包含要评估的函数名称的字符串。 quadv 是 quad 的向量化版本，由 f 定义的函数必须接受标量或向量作为输入，并返回标量，向量或数组作为输出。

trans-unit.source: <var>f</var> is a function handle, inline function, or string containing the name of the function to evaluate. The function <var>f</var> must be capable of accepting two column-vector arguments of equal length, or one column vector argument and a scalar.
trans-unit.target: <var>f</var> 是函数句柄，内联函数或包含要评估的函数名称的字符串。函数 <var>f</var> 必须能够接受两个相等长度的列向量自变量，或者一个列向量自变量和一个标量。

trans-unit.source: f is a function handle, inline function, or string containing the name of the function to evaluate. The function f must be of the form z = f(x,y) where x is a vector and y is a scalar. It should return a vector of the same length and orientation as x.
trans-unit.target: f 是函数句柄，内联函数或包含要评估的函数名称的字符串。函数 f 的形式必须为z = f（x，y），其中 x 是向量， y 是标量。它应返回长度和方向与 x 相同的向量。

trans-unit.source: <var>f</var> is a function handle, inline function, or string containing the name of the function to evaluate. The function <var>f</var> must be vectorized and must return a vector of output values if given a vector of input values. For example,
trans-unit.target: <var>f</var> 是函数句柄，内联函数或包含要评估的函数名称的字符串。如果给定输入值向量，则函数 <var>f</var> 必须向量化，并且必须返回输出值向量。例如，

trans-unit.source: <var>f</var> is a function handle, inline function, or string containing the name of the function to evaluate. The function <var>f</var> must be vectorized and return a vector of output values when given a vector of input values.
trans-unit.target: <var>f</var> 是函数句柄，内联函数或包含要评估的函数名称的字符串。给定输入值向量时，必须对函数 <var>f</var> 进行向量化并返回输出值向量。

trans-unit.source: f is a function handle, inline function, or string containing the name of the function to evaluate. The function f must have the form w = f(x,y,z) where either x or y is a vector and the remaining inputs are scalars. It should return a vector of the same length and orientation as x or y.
trans-unit.target: f 是函数句柄，内联函数或包含要评估的函数名称的字符串。函数 f 的形式必须为w = f（x，y，z），其中 x 或 y 为向量，其余输入为标量。它应返回与 x 或 y 具有相同长度和方向的向量。

trans-unit.source: f is a function handle, inline function, or string containing the name of the function to evaluate. The function f must have the form z = f(x,y) where x is a vector and y is a scalar. It should return a vector of the same length and orientation as x.
trans-unit.target: f 是函数句柄，内联函数或包含要评估的函数名称的字符串。函数 f 的形式必须为z = f（x，y），其中 x 是向量， y 是标量。它应返回长度和方向与 x 相同的向量。

trans-unit.source: f is a string, inline function, or function handle with two arguments defining the function. By default the plot is over the meshed domain -2*pi <= x | y <= 2*pi with 60 points in each dimension.
trans-unit.target: f 是一个字符串，内联函数或带有两个定义该函数的参数的函数句柄。默认情况下，绘图位于网格域 -2*pi <= x | y <= 2*pi ，每个维度中有60个点。

trans-unit.source: f is an FTP object returned by the ftp function.

trans-unit.source: f is the format string used to interpret date strings (see datestr). If date is a string, but no format is specified, then a relatively slow search is performed through various formats. It is always preferable to specify the format string f if it is known. Formats which do not specify a particular time component will have the value set to zero. Formats which do not specify a date will default to January 1st of the current year.
trans-unit.target: f 是用于解释日期字符串的格式字符串（请参见 datestr ）。如果 date 是字符串，但未指定格式，则通过各种格式执行相对慢的搜索。如果已知格式字符串 f ，则总是最好指定它。未指定特定时间成分的格式会将其值设置为零。不指定日期的格式将默认为当年的1月1日。

trans-unit.source: f must be one of "year", "month", "day", "hour", "minute", "second", or "millisecond".
trans-unit.target: f 必须是 "year" ， "month" ， "day" ， "hour" ， "minute" ， "second" 或 "millisecond" 。

trans-unit.source: <var>fcn</var> can be a function handle, a string or a cell array whose first element is a function handle. If <var>fcn</var> is a function handle, the corresponding function should accept at least 2 arguments, that will be set to the object handle and the empty matrix respectively. If <var>fcn</var> is a string, it must be any valid octave expression. If <var>fcn</var> is a cell array, the first element must be a function handle with the same signature as described above. The next elements of the cell array are passed as additional arguments to the function.
trans-unit.target: <var>fcn</var> 可以是函数句柄，字符串或单元格数组，其第一个元素是函数句柄。如果 <var>fcn</var> 是函数句柄，则相应的函数应至少接受2个参数，这将分别设置为对象句柄和空矩阵。如果 <var>fcn</var> 是字符串，则它必须是任何有效的八度表达式。如果 <var>fcn</var> 是一个单元数组，则第一个元素必须是具有如上所述相同签名的函数句柄。单元格数组的下一个元素作为附加参数传递给函数。

trans-unit.source: fcn should accept a vector (array) defining the unknown variables, and return a vector of left-hand sides of the equations. Right-hand sides are defined to be zeros. In other words, this function attempts to determine a vector x such that fcn (x) gives (approximately) all zeros.
trans-unit.target: fcn 应该接受定义未知变量的向量（数组），并返回方程式左侧的向量。右侧定义为零。换句话说，此函数尝试确定向量 x ，以使 fcn (x) 给出（近似）全零。

trans-unit.source: fcn should accept a vector (array) defining the unknown variables, and return the objective function value, optionally with gradient. fminunc attempts to determine a vector x such that fcn (x) is a local minimum.
trans-unit.target: fcn 应该接受定义未知变量的向量（数组），并返回目标函数值，并可选地返回梯度。 fminunc 尝试确定向量 x ，以使 fcn (x) 是局部最小值。

The various options and filename arguments may be given in any order, except for the figure handle argument hfig which must be first if it is present.

Set fixed_y0(i) component to 1 if you want to fix the value of y0(i). Set fixed_y0(i) component to 0 if you want to allow the value of y0(i) to change.

Set fixed_yp0(i) component to 1 if you want to fix the value of yp0(i). Set fixed_yp0(i) component to 0 if you want to allow the value of yp0(i) to change.

trans-unit.source: fun is a function handle, inline function, or string containing the name of the function that defines the ODE: 0 = f(t,y,yp). The function must accept three inputs where the first is time t, the second is the function value y (a column vector), and the third is the derivative value yp (a column vector).

trans-unit.source: <var>init</var> contains the initial value for the unknowns. If it is a row vector then the solution <var>y</var> will be a matrix in which each column is the solution for the corresponding initial value in <var>init</var>.

trans-unit.source: <var>iter(1)</var>: number of outer iterations, i.e., how many times the method restarted. (if <var>restart</var> is empty or <var>N</var>, then it is 1, if not 1 ≤ <var>iter(1)</var> ≤ <var>maxit</var>).
trans-unit.target: <var>iter(1)</var> ：外部迭代的次数，即方法重新启动的次数。（如果 <var>restart</var> 是空的或 <var>N</var> ，那么它是1，如果不是1≤ <var>iter(1)</var> ≤ <var>maxit</var> ）。

trans-unit.source: iter(2): the number of iterations performed before the restart, i.e., the method restarts when iter(2) = restart. If restart is empty or N, then 1 ≤ iter(2) ≤ maxit.
trans-unit.target: iter(2) ：重启之前执行的迭代次数，即，当 iter(2) = restart 时，方法重启。如果 restart 是空的或 N ，然后1≤ iter(2) ≤ maxit 。

trans-unit.source: iter indicates the iteration of x which it was computed. Since the output x corresponds to the minimal residual solution, the total number of iterations that the method performed is given by length(resvec) - 1.

trans-unit.source: keys is an array of unique keys for the map. The keys can be numeric scalars or strings. The type for numeric keys may be one of "double", "single", "int32", "uint32", "int64", or "uint64". Other numeric or logical keys will be converted to "double". A single string key may be entered as is. Multiple string keys are entered as a cell array of strings.
trans-unit.target: keys 是地图的唯一键的数组。键可以是数字标量或字符串。数字键的类型可以是 "double" ， "single" ， "int32" ， "uint32" ， "int64" 或 "uint64" 。其他数字或逻辑键将转换为 "double" 。可以直接输入单个字符串键。输入多个字符串键作为字符串的单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: knobs is an optional 1-element to 3-element input vector, with a default value of [10 1 0]. Entries not present are set to their defaults.
trans-unit.target: knobs 是1到3元素的可选输入向量，默认值为 [10 1 0] 。不存在的条目将设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: knobs is an optional 1-element to 5-element input vector, with a default value of [0 10 10 1 0] if not present or empty. Entries not present are set to their defaults.
trans-unit.target: knobs 是1到5元素的可选输入向量，如果不存在或为空，则默认值为 [0 10 10 1 0] 。不存在的条目被设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: knobs is an optional one- to three-element input vector. If S is m-by-n, then rows with more than max(16,knobs(1)*sqrt(n)) entries are ignored. Columns with more than max (16,knobs(2)*sqrt(min(m,n))) entries are removed prior to ordering, and ordered last in the output permutation p. Only completely dense rows or columns are removed if knobs(1) and knobs(2) are < 0, respectively. If knobs(3) is nonzero, stats and knobs are printed. The default is knobs = [10 10 0]. Note that knobs differs from earlier versions of colamd.
trans-unit.target: knobs 是可选的一到三元素输入向量。如果 S 是n乘n，那么将忽略具有大于 max(16,knobs(1)*sqrt(n)) 条目的行。列数大于 max (16,knobs(2)*sqrt(min(m,n))) 在排序之前被删除，并在输出排列 p 中最后排序。如果 knobs(1) 和 knobs(2) 分别小于0，则仅删除完全密集的行或列。如果 knobs(3) 不为零，则会打印 stats 和 knobs 。默认值为 knobs = [10 10 0] 。请注意， knobs 与colamd的早期版本不同。

trans-unit.source: knobs is an optional one- to two-element input vector. If S is n-by-n, then rows and columns with more than max (16,knobs(1)*sqrt(n)) entries are removed prior to ordering, and ordered last in the output permutation p. No rows/columns are removed if knobs(1) < 0. If knobs(2) is nonzero, stats and knobs are printed. The default is knobs = [10 0]. Note that knobs differs from earlier versions of symamd.
trans-unit.target: knobs 是一个可选的一到两个元素的输入向量。如果 S 是n乘n，则在排序之前删除具有大于 max (16,knobs(1)*sqrt(n)) 条目的行和列，并在输出排列 p 中最后排序。如果 knobs(1) < 0 则不会删除任何行/列。如果 knobs(2) 不为零，则会打印 stats 和 knobs 。默认值为 knobs = [10 0] 。请注意， knobs 与 symamd 的早期版本不同。

trans-unit.source: lambda is the diagonal matrix of eigenvalues of a. The result is equivalent to calling [v, lambda] = eig (a).
trans-unit.target: lambda 是 a 的特征值的对角矩阵。结果等同于调用 [v, lambda] = eig (a) 。

trans-unit.source: <var>line</var> is the line number at which to break. If <var>line</var> is not specified, it defaults to the first executable line in the file

trans-unit.source: <var>lower</var> and <var>upper</var> must be non-negative integers.

trans-unit.source: m is a HPD preconditioning matrix. For any decomposition m = p1 * p2 such that inv (p1) * A * inv (p2) is HPD, the conjugate gradient method is formally applied to the linear system inv (p1) * A * inv (p2) * y = inv (p1) * b, with x = inv (p2) * y (split preconditioning). In practice, at each iteration of the conjugate gradient method a linear system with matrix m is solved with mldivide. If a particular factorization m = m1 * m2 is available (for instance, an incomplete Cholesky factorization of a), the two matrices m1 and m2 can be passed and the relative linear systems are solved with the mldivide operator. Note that a proper choice of the preconditioner may dramatically improve the overall performance of the method. Instead of matrices m1 and m2, the user may pass two functions which return the results of applying the inverse of m1 and m2 to a vector. If m1 is omitted or empty [], then no preconditioning is applied. If no factorization of m is available, m2 can be omitted or left [], and the input variable m1 can be used to pass the preconditioner m.
trans-unit.target: m 是HPD预处理矩阵。对于任何分解 m = p1 * p2 使得 inv (p1) * A * inv (p2) 是HPD，共轭梯度法正式应用于线性系统 inv (p1) * A * inv (p2) * y = inv (p1) * b ，其中 x = inv (p2) * y （分割预处理）。实际上，在共轭梯度法的每次迭代中，矩阵为 m 的线性系统用 mldivide 解决。如果一个特定的因式分解 m = m1 * m2 可用（例如，一个不完整的Cholesky因式分解 a ），两个矩阵 m1 和 m2 可被传递，相对线性系统与解决 mldivide 操作者。请注意，正确选择预处理器可能会大大改善该方法的整体性能。代替矩阵 m1 和 m2 ，用户可以传递两个函数，这些函数返回将 m1 和 m2 的逆应用于向量的结果。如果 m1 省略或为空 [] ，则不应用任何预处理。如果无法使用 m 的因式分解，则可以省略 m2 或将其保留[[]]，并且可以使用输入变量 m1 传递预处理器 m 。

trans-unit.source: m is the (left) preconditioning matrix, so that the iteration is (theoretically) equivalent to solving by pcrP * x = m \ b, with P = m \ A. Note that a proper choice of the preconditioner may dramatically improve the overall performance of the method. Instead of matrix m, the user may pass a function which returns the results of applying the inverse of m to a vector (usually this is the preferred way of using the preconditioner). If [] is supplied for m, or m is omitted, no preconditioning is applied.
trans-unit.target: m 是（左）预处理矩阵，使得迭代（理论上）相当于通过求解 pcr P * x = m \ b ，用 P = m \ A 。请注意，正确选择预处理器可能会大大改善该方法的整体性能。代替矩阵 m ，用户可以传递一个函数，该函数返回将 m 的逆应用于向量的结果（通常，这是使用前置条件的首选方式）。如果为 m 提供 [] 或省略 m ，则不应用任何预处理。

trans-unit.source: p is a permutation vector such that S(p, p) tends to have its diagonal elements closer to the diagonal than S. This is a good preordering for LU or Cholesky factorization of matrices that come from “long, skinny” problems. It works for both symmetric and asymmetric S.

A positive value indicates the offset between the left (or bottom for the vertical component) of the screen, and the left (or bottom) of the figure. A negative value indicates the offset between the right (or top) of the screen and the right (or top) of the figure.

trans-unit.source: <var>r</var> can either be a vector of 3 elements representing the reduction factors in the x-, y-, and z-directions or a scalar, in which case the same reduction factor is used in all three dimensions.
trans-unit.target: <var>r</var> 可以是3个元素的向量，表示3个元素在x，y和z方向上的比例，也可以是一个标量，在这种情况下，所有三个维度都使用相同的比例。

trans-unit.source: <var>r</var> is a 2x<var>N</var> integer matrix specifying which elements to repeat and how often to repeat each element. Entries in the first row, <var>r</var>(1,j), select an element to repeat. The corresponding entry in the second row, <var>r</var>(2,j), specifies the repeat count. If <var>x</var> is a matrix then the columns of <var>x</var> are imagined to be stacked on top of each other for purposes of the selection index. A row vector is always returned.
trans-unit.target: <var>r</var> 是一个2x <var>N</var> 的整数矩阵，指定要重复的元素以及重复每个元素的频率。第一行 <var>r</var> （1，j）中的条目选择要重复的元素。第二行中的相应条目 <var>r</var> （2，j）指定重复计数。如果 <var>x</var> 是矩阵，则出于选择索引的目的，可以想象 <var>x</var> 的列彼此堆叠。总是返回行向量。

trans-unit.source: <var>r</var> is the distance to the origin (0, 0, 0).
trans-unit.target: <var>r</var> 是到原点的距离（0，0，0）。

trans-unit.source: <var>r</var> is the distance to the z-axis (0, 0, z).
trans-unit.target: <var>r</var> 是到z轴的距离（0，0，z）。

trans-unit.source: <var>relres</var> is the ratio of the final residual to its initial value, measured in the Euclidean norm.
trans-unit.target: <var>relres</var> 是最终残差与其初始值的比率，以欧几里得范数衡量。

trans-unit.source: resvec describes the convergence history of the method, so that resvec (i) contains the Euclidean norms of the residual after the (i-1)-th iteration, i = 1,2, …, iter+1.
trans-unit.target: resvec 描述了该方法的收敛历史，因此 resvec (i) 包含第（ i -1）次迭代后残差的欧几里得范数， i = 1,2, …, iter+1 。

trans-unit.source: resvec describes the convergence history of the method. resvec (i, 1) is the Euclidean norm of the residual, and resvec (i, 2) is the preconditioned residual norm, after the (i-1)-th iteration, i = 1, 2, …, iter+1. The preconditioned residual norm is defined as r' * (m \ r) where r = b - A * x, see also the description of m. If eigest is not required, only resvec (:, 1) is returned.
trans-unit.target: resvec 描述了该方法的收敛历史。 resvec (i, 1) 是残差的欧几里得范数，而 resvec (i, 2) 是经过第（ i -1）次迭代的 i = 1, 2, …, iter+1 的预处理残差范数。预处理残差范数定义为 r' * (m \ r) ，其中 r = b - A * x ，另请参见 m 的描述。如果 eigest ，则仅 resvec (:, 1) 。

trans-unit.source: resvec is a vector containing the residual at each iteration. The total number of iterations performed is given by length (resvec) - 1.
trans-unit.target: resvec 是一个向量，其中包含每次迭代的残差。执行的迭代总数由 length (resvec) - 1 。

trans-unit.source: <var>s</var> may also be a cell array of strings, in which case the replacement is done for each element and a cell array is returned.
trans-unit.target: <var>s</var> 也可以是字符串的单元格数组，在这种情况下，将对每个元素进行替换并返回单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: <var>s</var> may also be a string array or cell array of strings.
trans-unit.target: <var>s</var> 也可以是字符串的字符串数组或单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: <var>s</var> may be a character string, character matrix, or cell array. For character arrays the conversion is repeated for every row, and a double or complex array is returned. Empty rows in <var>s</var> are deleted and not returned in the numeric array. For cell arrays each character string element is processed and a double or complex array of the same dimensions as <var>s</var> is returned.
trans-unit.target: <var>s</var> 可以是字符串，字符矩阵或单元格数组。对于字符数组，将对每一行重复此转换，并返回一个double或complex数组。 <var>s</var> 中的空行将被删除，并且不会在数字数组中返回。对于单元数组，将处理每个字符串元素，并返回尺寸与 <var>s</var> 相同的双精度或复数数组。

trans-unit.source: shape = "full"
trans-unit.target: shape = "full"

trans-unit.target: shape = "same"

trans-unit.source: stats is an optional 20-element output vector that provides data about the ordering and the validity of the input matrix S. Ordering statistics are in stats(1 : 3). stats(1) and stats(2) are the number of dense or empty rows and columns ignored by CCOLAMD and stats(3) is the number of garbage collections performed on the internal data structure used by CCOLAMD (roughly of size 2.2 * nnz (S) + 4 * m + 7 * n integers).
trans-unit.target: stats 是一个可选的20元素输出向量，它提供有关输入矩阵 S 的排序和有效性的数据。订单统计信息包含在 stats(1 : 3) 。 stats(1) 和 stats(2) 是CCOLAMD忽略的密集行或空行和列的数量，而 stats(3) 是对CCOLAMD使用的内部数据结构执行的垃圾回收的数量（大小为 2.2 * nnz (S) + 4 * m + 7 * n 整数）。

trans-unit.source: stats is an optional 20-element output vector that provides data about the ordering and the validity of the input matrix S. Ordering statistics are in stats(1:3). stats(1) = stats(2) is the number of dense or empty rows and columns ignored by SYMAMD and stats(3) is the number of garbage collections performed on the internal data structure used by SYMAMD (roughly of size 8.4 * nnz (tril (S, -1)) + 9 * n integers).
trans-unit.target: stats 是一个可选的20元素输出向量，它提供有关输入矩阵 S 的排序和有效性的数据。订单统计信息包含在 stats(1:3) 。 stats(1) = stats(2) 是SYMAMD忽略的密集行或空行和列的数量，而 stats(3) 是SYMAMD使用的内部数据结构执行的垃圾回收的数量（大小约为 8.4 * nnz (tril (S, -1)) + 9 * n 整数）。

trans-unit.source: stats is an optional 20-element output vector that provides data about the ordering and the validity of the input matrix S. Ordering statistics are in stats(1:3). stats(1) and stats(2) are the number of dense or empty rows and columns ignored by COLAMD and stats(3) is the number of garbage collections performed on the internal data structure used by COLAMD (roughly of size 2.2 * nnz(S) + 4 * m + 7 * n integers).
trans-unit.target: stats 是一个可选的20元素输出向量，它提供有关输入矩阵 S 的排序和有效性的数据。订单统计信息包含在 stats(1:3) 。 stats(1) 和 stats(2) 是COLAMD忽略的密集行或空行和列的数量，而 stats(3) 是对COLAMD使用的内部数据结构执行的垃圾回收的数量（大小为 2.2 * nnz(S) + 4 * m + 7 * n 整数）。

trans-unit.source: <var>str</var> and <var>ptn</var> can be ordinary strings, cell array of strings, or character arrays.
trans-unit.target: <var>str</var> 和 <var>ptn</var> 可以是普通字符串，字符串单元格数组或字符数组。

trans-unit.source: <var>str</var> may also be a cell array of strings in which case the function executes on every individual string and returns a cell array of tokens and remainders.
trans-unit.target: <var>str</var> 也可以是字符串的单元格数组，在这种情况下，函数在每个单独的字符串上执行并返回令牌和余数的单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: <var>sz</var> is either a vector of 3 elements representing the size of the convolution kernel in x-, y- and z-direction or a scalar, in which case the same size is used in all three dimensions. The default value is 3.
trans-unit.target: <var>sz</var> 是3个元素的向量，表示x，y和z方向上卷积核的大小，或者是标量，在这种情况下，所有三个维度都使用相同的大小。预设值为3。

trans-unit.source: t0 is the initial time such that fun(t0, y0_new, yp0_new) = 0, specified as a scalar.
trans-unit.target: t0 是指定为标量的 fun(t0, y0_new, yp0_new) = 0 的初始时间。

trans-unit.source: <var>table</var> and <var>y</var> can also be cell arrays of strings (or <var>y</var> can be a single string). In this case, string lookup is performed using lexicographical comparison.
trans-unit.target: <var>table</var> 和 <var>y</var> 也可以是字符串的单元格数组（或 <var>y</var> 可以是单个字符串）。在这种情况下，使用词典顺序比较来执行字符串查找。

trans-unit.source: <var>theta</var> describes the angle relative to the positive x-axis.
trans-unit.target: <var>theta</var> 描述相对于正x轴的角度。

trans-unit.source: <var>title</var> is a string and the options may be input as individual strings or as a cell array of strings.
trans-unit.target: <var>title</var> 是一个字符串，选项可以作为单个字符串或作为字符串的单元格数组输入。

trans-unit.source: tol defaults to eps * max (size (A)) * norm (A, inf).
trans-unit.target: tol 默认为 eps * max (size (A)) * norm (A, inf) 。

trans-unit.source: <var>tol</var> defaults to pi.
trans-unit.target: <var>tol</var> 默认为pi。

trans-unit.source: tol is a weighting factor in the range [0, 1) which determines the tolerance of the matching. The default value is 100 * eps and the resulting tolerance for a given complex pair is tol * abs (z(i))).
trans-unit.target: tol 是确定匹配容差的[0，1）范围内的加权因子。默认值为 100 * eps ，给定复数对的最终公差为 tol * abs (z(i))) 。

trans-unit.source: <var>tol</var> is the relative tolerance to use for the plot and defaults to 2e-3 (.2%).
trans-unit.target: <var>tol</var> 是用于绘图的相对公差，默认为2e-3（.2％）。

trans-unit.source: tol is the required relative tolerance for the residual error, b - A * x. The iteration stops if norm (b - A * x) <= tol * norm (b - A * x0). If tol is empty or is omitted, the function sets tol = 1e-6 by default.
trans-unit.target: tol 是残余误差 b - A * x 所需的相对公差。如果 norm (b - A * x) <= tol * norm (b - A * x0) ，则迭代停止。如果 tol 为空或被省略，则默认情况下该函数将 tol = 1e-6 设置为1e-6。

trans-unit.source: tol is the required relative tolerance for the residual error, b - A * x. The iteration stops if norm (b - A * x) ≤ tol * norm (b). If tol is omitted or empty, then a tolerance of 1e-6 is used.
trans-unit.target: tol 是残余误差 b - A * x 所需的相对公差。迭代停止如果 norm (b - A * x) ≤ tol * norm (b) 。如果 tol 省略或为空，则使用1e-6的公差。

trans-unit.source: <var>tol</var> is the tolerance to which the 2-norm is calculated. By default <var>tol</var> is 1e-6.
trans-unit.target: <var>tol</var> 是计算2-范数的公差。默认情况下， <var>tol</var> 为1e-6。

trans-unit.source: trange specifies the time interval over which the ODE will be evaluated. Typically, it is a two-element vector specifying the initial and final times ([tinit, tfinal]). If there are more than two elements then the solution will also be evaluated at these intermediate time instances.
trans-unit.target: trange 指定将评估ODE的时间间隔。通常，它是一个由两个元素组成的向量，用于指定初始时间和最终时间（ [tinit, tfinal] ）。如果元素多于两个，则还将在这些中间时间实例处评估解决方案。

trans-unit.source: <var>tri</var> is typically the output of a Delaunay triangulation over the grid of <var>x</var>, <var>y</var>. Every row of <var>tri</var> represents one triangle and contains three indices into [<var>x</var>, <var>y</var>] which are the vertices of the triangles in the x-y plane.
trans-unit.target: <var>tri</var> 通常是 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> 网格上Delaunay三角剖分的输出。 <var>tri</var> 的每一行代表一个三角形，并包含[ <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> ]的三个索引，它们是xy平面中三角形的顶点。

trans-unit.source: <var>tri</var> is typically the output of a Delaunay triangulation over the grid of <var>x</var>, <var>y</var>. Every row of <var>tri</var> represents one triangle and contains three indices into [<var>x</var>, <var>y</var>] which are the vertices of the triangles in the x-y plane. <var>z</var> determines the height above the plane of each vertex.
trans-unit.target: <var>tri</var> 通常是 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> 网格上Delaunay三角剖分的输出。 <var>tri</var> 的每一行代表一个三角形，并包含[ <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> ]的三个索引，它们是xy平面中三角形的顶点。 <var>z</var> 确定每个顶点平面上方的高度。

trans-unit.source: <var>tri</var> is typically the output of a Delaunay triangulation over the grid of <var>x</var>, <var>y</var>. Every row of <var>tri</var> represents one triangle and contains three indices into [<var>x</var>, <var>y</var>] which are the vertices of the triangles in the x-y plane. <var>z</var> determines the height above the plane of each vertex. If no <var>z</var> input is given then the triangles are plotted as a 2-D figure.
trans-unit.target: <var>tri</var> 通常是 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> 网格上Delaunay三角剖分的输出。 <var>tri</var> 的每一行代表一个三角形，并包含[ <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> ]的三个索引，它们是xy平面中三角形的顶点。 <var>z</var> 确定每个顶点平面上方的高度。如果未提供 <var>z</var> 输入，则将三角形绘制为二维图形。

trans-unit.source: <var>type</var> determines the type of the property to create. <var>args</var> usually contains the default value of the property, but additional arguments might be given, depending on the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: <var>type</var> 确定要创建的属性的类型。 <var>args</var> 通常包含属性的默认值，但是根据属性的类型，可能会给出其他参数。

trans-unit.source: <var>type</var> may also be the concatenation of a core object type and a valid property name for that object type. The property created then has the same characteristics as the referenced property (type, possible values, hidden state…). This allows one to clone an existing property into the graphics object <var>h</var>.
trans-unit.target: <var>type</var> 也可以是核心对象类型和该对象类型的有效属性名称的串联。然后，创建的属性与引用的属性具有相同的特征（类型，可能的值，隐藏状态…）。这允许将现有属性克隆到图形对象 <var>h</var> 中。

trans-unit.source: x and y are optional 2-element vectors, [min, max], which specify the coordinates of the centers of the corner pixels. If a range is specified as [max, min] then the image will be reversed along that axis. For convenience, x and y may be specified as N-element vectors matching the length of the data in img. However, only the first and last elements will be used to determine the axis limits.
trans-unit.target: x 和 y 是可选的2元素矢量 [min, max] ，用于指定角点像素中心的坐标。如果将范围指定为 [max, min] 则图像将沿该轴反转。为了方便起见，可以将 x 和 y 指定为与 img 中的数据长度匹配的N元素向量。但是，仅第一个和最后一个元素将用于确定轴限制。

trans-unit.source: x and y are optional 2-element vectors, [min, max], which specify the coordinates of the centers of the corner pixels. If a range is specified as [max, min] then the image will be reversed along that axis. For convenience, x and y may be specified as N-element vectors matching the length of the data in img. However, only the first and last elements will be used to determine the image limits.
trans-unit.target: x 和 y 是可选的2元素矢量 [min, max] ，用于指定角点像素中心的坐标。如果将范围指定为 [max, min] 则图像将沿该轴反转。为了方便起见，可以将 x 和 y 指定为与 img 中的数据长度匹配的N元素向量。但是，仅第一个和最后一个元素将用于确定图像限制。

trans-unit.source: <var>y0</var> and <var>yp0</var> contain the initial values for the unknowns <var>y</var> and <var>yp</var>. If they are row vectors then the solution <var>y</var> will be a matrix in which each column is the solution for the corresponding initial value in <var>y0</var> and <var>yp0</var>.
trans-unit.target: <var>y0</var> 和 <var>yp0</var> 包含未知数 <var>y</var> 和 <var>yp</var> 的初始值。如果它们是行向量，则解 <var>y</var> 将是一个矩阵，其中每一列都是 <var>y0</var> 和 <var>yp0</var> 中相应初始值的解。

trans-unit.source: y0 and yp0 must be consistent initial conditions, meaning that f(t,y0,yp0) = 0 is satisfied. The function decic may be used to compute consistent initial conditions given initial guesses.
trans-unit.target: y0 和 yp0 必须是一致的初始条件，这意味着 f(t,y0,yp0) = 0 。给定初始猜测值，函数 decic 可用于计算一致的初始条件。

trans-unit.source: <var>y0</var> is a vector used as the initial guess for <var>y</var>.
trans-unit.target: <var>y0</var> 是用作 <var>y</var> 的初始猜测的向量。

trans-unit.source: <var>y</var> and <var>x</var> must match in size and orientation. The signs of elements of <var>y</var> and <var>x</var> are used to determine the quadrants of each resulting value.
trans-unit.target: <var>y</var> 和 <var>x</var> 必须在大小和方向上匹配。 <var>y</var> 和 <var>x</var> 元素的符号用于确定每个结果值的象限。

trans-unit.source: y can be either a vector or array. If y is a vector it must have a length of either n or n + 2. If the length of y is n, then the "not-a-knot" end condition is used. If the length of y is n + 2, then the first and last values of the vector y are the values of the first derivative of the cubic spline at the endpoints.
trans-unit.target: y 可以是向量或数组。如果 y 是向量，则其长度必须为 n 或 n + 2 。如果 y 的长度为 n ，则使用 "not-a-knot" 结束条件。如果 y 的长度为 n + 2 ，则向量 y 的第一个和最后一个值是三次样条曲线在端点处的一阶导数的值。

trans-unit.source: y can be either a vector or array. If y is a vector then it must be the same length n as x. If y is an array then the size of y must have the form [s1, s2, …, sk, n] The array is reshaped internally to a matrix where the leading dimension is given by s1 * s2 * … * sk and each row of this matrix is then treated separately. Note that this is exactly opposite to interp1 but is done for MATLAB compatibility.
trans-unit.target: y 可以是向量或数组。如果 y 是一个向量，那么它必须是相同的长度 n 作为 x 。如果 y 是一个数组然后的大小 y 必须具有形式 [s1, s2, …, sk, n] 该阵列内部再成形为其中超前尺寸由下式给出一个矩阵 s1 * s2 * … * sk 和每行然后将该基质的一部分单独处理。注意，这与 interp1 完全相反，但是这样做是为了实现MATLAB兼容性。

trans-unit.source: <var>yp0</var> is a vector used as the initial guess for <var>yp</var>.
trans-unit.target: <var>yp0</var> 是用作 <var>yp</var> 的初始猜测的向量。

trans-unit.source: A JIT compiler works by analyzing the body of a loop, translating the Octave statements into another language, compiling the new code segment into an executable, and then running the executable and collecting any results. The process is not simple and there is a significant amount of work to perform for each step. It can still make sense, however, if the number of loop iterations is large. Because Octave is an interpreted language every time through a loop Octave must parse the statements in the loop body before executing them. With a JIT compiler this is done just once when the body is translated to another language.
trans-unit.target: JIT编译器的工作原理是分析循环的主体,将Octave语句翻译成另一种语言,将新的代码段编译成可执行文件,然后运行可执行文件并收集任何结果。这个过程并不简单,每一步都有大量的工作要执行。不过,如果循环迭代次数较多,它还是有意义的。因为Octave是一种解释语言,每次通过循环时,Octave必须在执行循环体中的语句之前对其进行解析。如果使用JIT编译器,当主体被翻译成另一种语言时,这只需要做一次。

The chart is similar to the histogram or bar chart, except that the bars are arranged in decreasing magnitude from left to right along the x-axis.

trans-unit.source: A Voronoi diagram or Voronoi tessellation of a set of points s in an N-dimensional space, is the tessellation of the N-dimensional space such that all points in v(p), a partitions of the tessellation where p is a member of s, are closer to p than any other point in s. The Voronoi diagram is related to the Delaunay triangulation of a set of points, in that the vertexes of the Voronoi tessellation are the centers of the circum-circles of the simplices of the Delaunay tessellation.
trans-unit.target: N维空间中点 s 的集合的Voronoi图或Voronoi镶嵌是N维空间的镶嵌，使得 v(p) 中的所有点都是镶嵌的分区，其中 p 是 s 的成员，比 s 中的任何其他点更接近 p 。 Voronoi图与一组点的Delaunay三角剖分有关，因为Voronoi细分的顶点是Delaunay细分的单纯形的外接圆的中心。

trans-unit.source: A color in HSV space is represented by hue, saturation and value (brightness) levels in a cylindrical coordinate system. Hue is the azimuth and describes the dominant color. Saturation is the radial distance and gives the amount of hue mixed into the color. Value is the height and is the amount of light in the color.

trans-unit.source: A consequence is that “pulling back” on the up vector does not pitch the camera view (as that would require changing the target). Setting the up vector is thus typically used only to roll the camera. A more intuitive command for this purpose is see camroll.

trans-unit.source: A constant spacing between two points can be provided by the <var>s</var> parameter. If <var>s</var> is a scalar, it is assumed to be the spacing for all dimensions. Otherwise, separate values of the spacing can be supplied by the <var>x</var>, … arguments. Scalar values specify an equidistant spacing. Vector values for the <var>x</var>, … arguments specify the coordinate for that dimension. The length must match their respective dimension of <var>m</var>.
trans-unit.target: <var>s</var> 参数可以在两点之间提供恒定的间距。如果 <var>s</var> 为标量，则假定为所有尺寸的间距。否则，可以通过 <var>x</var> ，…参数提供单独的间距值。标量值指定等距间距。 <var>x</var> ，…参数的矢量值指定该尺寸的坐标。长度必须与它们各自的尺寸 <var>m</var> 相匹配。

trans-unit.source: A diagonal matrix can also be transposed or conjugate-transposed, giving the expected result. Extracting a leading submatrix of a diagonal matrix, i.e., D(1:m,1:n), will produce a diagonal matrix, other indexing expressions will implicitly convert to full matrix.

trans-unit.source: A diagonal matrix is defined as a matrix that has zero entries outside the main diagonal; that is, D(i,j) == 0 if i != j. Most often, square diagonal matrices are considered; however, the definition can equally be applied to non-square matrices, in which case we usually speak of a rectangular diagonal matrix.
trans-unit.target: 对角矩阵定义为在主对角线之外具有零项的矩阵。也就是说，如果 i != j ，则 D(i,j) == 0 。最常见的是，考虑对角矩阵。但是，该定义同样适用于非正方形矩阵，在这种情况下，我们通常说的是矩形对角矩阵。

trans-unit.source: A further constraint on the sparse matrix storage used by Octave is that all elements in the rows are stored in increasing order of their row index, which makes certain operations faster. However, it imposes the need to sort the elements on the creation of sparse matrices. Having disordered elements is potentially an advantage in that it makes operations such as concatenating two sparse matrices together easier and faster, however it adds complexity and speed problems elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: Octave使用的稀疏矩阵存储的另一个约束条件是,行中的所有元素按其行索引的递增顺序存储,这使得某些操作变得更快。然而,它要求在创建稀疏矩阵时需要对元素进行排序。拥有无序元素是一个潜在的优势,因为它使诸如将两个稀疏矩阵连接在一起的操作变得更容易和更快,然而它在其他地方增加了复杂性和速度问题。

trans-unit.source: A matrix is skew-Hermitian if the complex conjugate transpose of the matrix is equal to the negative of the original matrix: A == -A'. If a tolerance is given then the calculation is norm (A + A', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol.

trans-unit.source: A matrix is skew-symmetric if the transpose of the matrix is equal to the negative of the original matrix: A == -A.'. If a tolerance is given then skew-symmetry is determined by norm (A + A.', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩阵的转置等于原始矩阵的负数，则矩阵是歪斜对称的： A == -A.' 。如果给定了公差，则偏斜对称性由 norm (A + A.', Inf) / norm (A, Inf) < tol 。

trans-unit.source: A note on terminology: “broadcasting” is the term popularized by the Numpy numerical environment in the Python programming language. trans-unit.source: A permutation matrix can also be returned from the built-in functions lu and qr, if a pivoted factorization is requested.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要透视分解，也可以从内置函数lu和qr返回置换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: A permutation matrix can be transposed (or conjugate-transposed, which is the same, because a permutation matrix is never complex), inverting the permutation, or equivalently, turning a row-permutation matrix into a column-permutation one. For permutation matrices, transpose is equivalent to inversion, thus P\M is equivalent to P'*M. Transpose of a permutation matrix (or inverse) is a constant-time operation, flipping only a flag internally, and thus the choice between the two above equivalent expressions for inverse permuting is completely up to the user’s taste.
trans-unit.target: 可以置换一个置换矩阵（或共轭置换，这是相同的，因为置换矩阵从不复杂），可以反转置换，或者等效地将行置换矩阵转换为列置换。为置换矩阵，转置相当于反转，从而 P\M 相当于 P'*M 。置换矩阵（或逆矩阵）的转置是固定时间的操作，仅在内部翻转标志，因此，上述两个用于逆置换的等效表达式之间的选择完全取决于用户的喜好。

trans-unit.source: A permutation matrix is defined as a square matrix that has a single element equal to unity in each row and each column; all other elements are zero. That is, there exists a permutation (vector) p such that P(i,j) == 1 if j == p(i) and P(i,j) == 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 置换矩阵定义为在每个行和每一列中具有等于1的单个元素的方阵；其他所有元素均为零。也就是说，存在一个置换（矢量） p ，使得 P(i,j) == 1 如果 j == p(i) 和 P(i,j) == 0 否则。

trans-unit.source: A positive <var>k</var> leads to a left shift; A negative value to a right shift.
trans-unit.target: 正 <var>k</var> 导致左移；负值右移。

trans-unit.source: A prime number is conventionally defined as a positive integer greater than 1 (e.g., 2, 3, …) which is divisible only by itself and 1. Octave extends this definition to include both negative integers and complex values. A negative integer is prime if its positive counterpart is prime. This is equivalent to isprime (abs (x)).
trans-unit.target: 素数通常定义为大于1（例如，2、3，...）的正整数，该整数只能被其自身和1整除。八度扩展此定义以包括负整数和复数值。如果负整数为正数，则为负数。这等效于 isprime (abs (x)) 。

trans-unit.source: A radio property that can have the values "on" or "off" that flags whether the contours to plot are to be filled.
trans-unit.target: 可以具有值 "on" 或 "off" 的无线电属性，用于标记是否要填充要绘制的轮廓。

trans-unit.target: 一个只读属性，其中包含用于创建绘图轮廓的 contourc 返回的数据。

trans-unit.source: A repeat instruction R_j must either be a scalar or a vector. If the instruction is a scalar then each component of x in dimension j is repeated R_j times. If the instruction is a vector then it must have the same number of elements as the corresponding dimension j of x. In this case, the kth component of dimension j is repeated R_j(k) times.
trans-unit.target: 重复指令 R_j 必须是标量或向量。如果指令是标量，则将维度 j 中 x 的每个分量重复 R_j 次。如果该指令是一个矢量，那么它必须具有相同数量的元件与相应的尺寸的 j 的 x 。在这种情况下，将维度 j 的第 k 个分量重复 R_j(k) （ k ）次。

trans-unit.source: A row vector that selects which dimensions of the calculation will appear in the output <var>y</var>. This is only useful when <var>fcn</var> returns an N-dimensional array in Format 1. The default is to return all output dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 选择输出的维数的行向量将出现在输出 <var>y</var> 中。仅当 <var>fcn</var> 以格式1返回N维数组时，此选项才有用。默认值是返回所有输出维。

trans-unit.source: A script file also differs from a function file in that the variables named in a script file are not local variables, but are in the same scope as the other variables that are visible on the command line.
trans-unit.target: 脚本文件也不同于函数文件,脚本文件中命名的变量不是局部变量,而是与命令行上可见的其他变量处于同一范围。

trans-unit.source: A script file is a file containing (almost) any sequence of Octave commands. It is read and evaluated just as if you had typed each command at the Octave prompt, and provides a convenient way to perform a sequence of commands that do not logically belong inside a function.
trans-unit.target: 脚本文件是一个包含(几乎)任何Octave命令序列的文件。它的读取和评估就像你在Octave提示符下键入每一条命令一样,它提供了一种方便的方式来执行一系列在逻辑上不属于一个函数的命令。

trans-unit.source: A second use of indexing is to speed up code. Indexing is a fast operation and judicious use of it can reduce the requirement for looping over individual array elements, which is a slow operation.
trans-unit.target: 索引的第二个用途是加快代码速度。索引是一种快速的操作,明智地使用它可以减少对单个数组元素的循环要求,因为这是一种缓慢的操作。

trans-unit.source: A significant difference between interpn and the other two multi-dimensional interpolation functions is the fashion in which the dimensions are treated. For interp2 and interp3, the y-axis is considered to be the columns of the matrix, whereas the x-axis corresponds to the rows of the array. As Octave indexes arrays in column major order, the first dimension of any array is the columns, and so interpn effectively reverses the ’x’ and ’y’ dimensions. Consider the example,
trans-unit.target: interpn 和其他两个多维插值函数之间的显着区别是处理维的方式。对于 interp2 和 interp3 ，将y轴视为矩阵的列，而x轴则对应于数组的行。由于Octave以列的主要顺序对数组进行索引，因此任何数组的第一维都是列，因此 interpn 有效地反转了“ x”和“ y”维。考虑这个例子，

trans-unit.source: A single dynamically linked file might define several functions. However, as Octave searches for functions based on the functions filename, Octave needs a manner in which to find each of the functions in the dynamically linked file. On operating systems that support symbolic links, it is possible to create a symbolic link to the original file for each of the functions which it contains.
trans-unit.target: 一个动态链接的文件可能定义了多个函数,但Octave根据函数的文件名搜索函数,Octave需要找到动态链接文件中的每个函数。然而,由于Octave会根据函数文件名搜索函数,因此Octave需要一种方式来找到动态链接文件中的每个函数。在支持符号链接的操作系统上,可以为每一个包含函数的文件创建一个到原始文件的符号链接。

trans-unit.source: A string array is a data type that stores strings (row vectors of characters) at each element in the array. It is distinct from character arrays which are N-dimensional arrays where each element is a single 1x1 character. It is also distinct from cell arrays of strings which store strings at each element, but use cell indexing ‘

trans-unit.target: 包含使用的用户CPU时间的结构。该结构的元素为 sec （秒）， usec （微秒）。

trans-unit.source: A structure in Octave is a map between a number of fields represented and their values. The Standard Template Library map class is used, with the pair consisting of a std::string and an Octave Cell variable.
trans-unit.target: Octave中的结构是表示的多个字段与其值之间的映射。使用标准模板库 map 类，该对类由 std::string 和Octave Cell 变量组成。

trans-unit.source: A uibuttongroup is used to group uicontrol objects.
trans-unit.target: uibuttongroup用于对uicontrol对象进行分组。

trans-unit.source: A uicontrol object is used to create simple interactive controls such as push buttons, checkboxes, edit and list controls.
trans-unit.target: uicontrol对象用于创建简单的交互式控件,如按钮、复选框、编辑和列表控件。

trans-unit.source: A uitable object is used to show tables of data in a figure window.
trans-unit.target: uitable对象用于在图形窗口中显示数据的表格。

trans-unit.target: 用户定义的函数,每次算法迭代执行一次。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined string to label the graphics object.
trans-unit.target: 用于标记图形对象的用户自定义字符串。

trans-unit.source: A valid function name is like a valid variable name: a sequence of letters, digits and underscores, not starting with a digit. Functions share the same pool of names as variables.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的函数名就像一个有效的变量名一样:一个由字母、数字和下划线组成的序列,而不是以数字开头。函数与变量共享同一个名字。

trans-unit.source: A valid variable name is a sequence of letters, digits, and underscores that does not begin with a digit.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的变量名是一个不以数字开头的字母、数字和下划线的序列。

trans-unit.source: A valid variable name is composed of letters, digits, and underscores ("_"), and the first character must not be a digit.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的变量名由字母、数字和下划线("_")组成,第一个字符不能是数字。

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 or true instructs textscan to concatenate consecutive columns of the same class in the output cell array. A value of 0 or false (default) leaves output in distinct columns.
trans-unit.target: 值为1或true指示 textscan 串联输出单元格数组中同一类的连续列。值为0或false（默认）会将输出留在不同的列中。

trans-unit.source: A value of info = 1 indicates that the solution has converged.
trans-unit.target: info = 1 值表示解决方案已经收敛。

trans-unit.target: 大于1 的 <var>zf</var> 值会“放大”，以使场景放大显示：

trans-unit.target: 小于1的值“缩小”，因此相机可以看到更多场景：

trans-unit.source: A variable may be declared global using a global declaration statement. The following statements are all global declarations.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 global 声明语句将变量声明为全局变量。以下语句均为全局声明。

trans-unit.source: A variable name is a valid expression by itself. It represents the variable’s current value. Variables are given new values with assignment operators and increment operators. See Assignment Expressions.
trans-unit.target: 变量名本身就是有效的表达式。它代表变量的当前值。使用赋值运算符和增量运算符为变量赋予新值。请参阅赋值表达式。

trans-unit.source: A variable that has been declared global may be accessed from within a function body without having to pass it as a formal parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以从函数体内访问已声明为全局变量，而不必将其作为形式参数传递。

trans-unit.source: A variable that has been declared persistent within a function will retain its contents in memory between subsequent calls to the same function. The difference between persistent variables and global variables is that persistent variables are local in scope to a particular function and are not visible elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 在一个函数中声明为持久性的变量将在后续对该函数的调用之间将其内容保留在内存中。持久变量与全局变量之间的区别在于，持久变量在范围上是特定函数的局部变量，在其他地方不可见。

trans-unit.target: 多项式解释的一种非常特殊的形式是Padé近似值。对于控制系统，可以使用近似值非常简单地对连续时间延迟进行建模。

trans-unit.source: API for portable 2-D and 3-D graphics (https://www.opengl.org). An OpenGL implementation is required to provide Octave’s OpenGL-based graphics functions. Octave’s OpenGL-based graphics functions usually outperform the gnuplot-based graphics functions because plot data can be rendered directly instead of sending data and commands to gnuplot for interpretation and rendering.
trans-unit.target: 适用于便携式2D和3D图形的API（https://www.opengl.org）。要提供Octave基于OpenGL的图形功能，需要使用OpenGL实现。Octave基于OpenGL的图形功能通常优于基于gnuplot的图形功能，因为可以直接绘制绘图数据，而不是将数据和命令发送到gnuplot进行解释和渲染。

trans-unit.source: Additional arguments determine the shape of the return matrix. When no arguments are specified a single random integer is returned. If one argument <var>n</var> is specified then a square matrix (<var>n</var> x <var>n</var>) is returned. Two or more arguments will return a multi-dimensional matrix (<var>m</var> x <var>n</var> x …).
trans-unit.target: 附加参数确定返回矩阵的形状。如果未指定任何参数，则返回单个随机整数。如果指定了一个参数 <var>n</var> ,则返回方阵（ <var>n</var> x <var>n</var> ）。两个或多个参数将返回一个多维矩阵（ <var>m</var> x <var>n</var> x…）。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, material can be called with a single output argument. If called without input arguments, a column cell vector mtypes with the strings for all available materials is returned. If the one input argument mtype_string is the name of a material, a 1x5 cell vector refl_props with the reflectance properties of that material is returned. In both cases, no graphic properties are changed.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if sparse_auto_mutate is true, all sparse functions test the amount of memory occupied by the sparse matrix to see if the amount of storage used is larger than the amount used by the full equivalent. Therefore speye (2) * 1 will return a full matrix as the memory used is smaller for the full version than the sparse version.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果 sparse_auto_mutate 为true，则所有稀疏函数都会测试稀疏矩阵占用的内存量，以查看所使用的存储量是否大于完全等效的存储量。因此， speye (2) * 1 将返回完整矩阵，因为完整版本所使用的内存小于稀疏版本。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if i is a requested output then one of "first" or "last" may be given as an input. If "last" is specified, return the highest possible indices in i, otherwise, if "first" is specified, return the lowest. The default is "last".
trans-unit.target: 另外，如果 i 是请求的输出，则可以将 "first" 或 "last" 作为输入。如果指定了 "last" ，则返回 i 中可能的最高索引，否则，如果指定 "first" ，则返回最低的索引。默认值为 "last" 。

trans-unit.source: After being marked as deprecated for two major releases, the following functions have been removed from Octave. trans-unit.source: Algebraic eigenvalue balancing uses standard <small>LAPACK</small> routines.
trans-unit.target: 代数特征值平衡使用标准的<small>LAPACK</small>例程。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm Note: condest uses a randomized algorithm to approximate the 1-norms. Therefore, if consistent results are required, the "state" of the random generator should be fixed before invoking condest.
trans-unit.target: 算法说明： condest 使用随机算法来近似1-范数。因此，如果需要一致的结果，则应在调用 condest 之前固定随机生成器的 "state" 。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm Note: normest1 uses random numbers during evaluation. Therefore, if consistent results are required, the "state" of the random generator should be fixed before invoking normest1.
trans-unit.target: 算法说明： normest1 在评估期间使用随机数。因此，如果需要一致的结果，则应在调用 normest1 之前固定随机生成器的 "state" 。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm Notes: The <small>LAPACK</small> library provides two routines for calculating the full singular value decomposition (left and right singular matrices as well as singular values). When calculating just the singular values the following discussion is not relevant.
trans-unit.target: 算法说明：<small>LAPACK</small>库提供了两个例程，用于计算完整的奇异值分解（左右奇异矩阵以及奇异值）。仅计算奇异值时，以下讨论不相关。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm Notes: When calculating the full decomposition (left and right singular matrices in addition to singular values) there is a choice of two routines in LAPACK. The default routine used by Octave is gesvd. The alternative is gesdd which is 5X faster, but may use more memory and may be inaccurate for some input matrices. See the documentation for svd_driver for more information on choosing a driver.
trans-unit.target: 算法注释：在计算完全分解时（除了奇异值之外，还有左和右奇异矩阵），可以在LAPACK中选择两个例程。Octave使用的默认例程是 gesvd 。替代方法是 gesdd ，它快5倍，但可能会使用更多的内存，并且对于某些输入矩阵可能不准确。有关选择驱动程序的更多信息，请参见 svd_driver 的文档。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm taken from Golub and Van Loan,
trans-unit.target: 算法取自Golub和Van Loan。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm terminated by OutputFcn.
trans-unit.target: 算法由 OutputFcn 终止。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm: The normal vectors are calculated by taking the cross product of the diagonals of each of the quadrilateral faces in the meshgrid to find the normal vectors at the center of each face. Next, for each meshgrid point the four nearest normal vectors are averaged to obtain the final normal to the surface at the meshgrid point.
trans-unit.target: 算法。法线矢量的计算方法是:取网格中每个四边形面的对角线的交叉乘积,找出每个面中心的法线矢量。接下来,对于每个网格点,将最近的四个法向量进行平均,得到网格点处的最终法线。

trans-unit.source: All Java-based routines are run in the JVM’s shared memory pool, a dedicated and separate part of memory claimed by the JVM from your computer’s total memory (which comprises physical RAM and virtual memory / swap space on hard disk).
trans-unit.target: 所有基于Java的例程都在JVM的共享内存池中运行，这是JVM要求的专用和独立内存部分，它与计算机的总内存（包括物理RAM和虚拟内存/硬盘上的交换空间）有关。

trans-unit.source: All of the solvers above, can calculate an estimate of the condition number. This can be used to detect numerical stability problems in the solution and force a minimum norm solution to be used. However, for narrow banded, triangular or diagonal matrices, the cost of calculating the condition number is significant, and can in fact exceed the cost of factoring the matrix. Therefore the condition number is not calculated in these cases, and Octave relies on simpler techniques to detect singular matrices or the underlying <small>LAPACK</small> code in the case of banded matrices.
trans-unit.target: 以上所有求解器都可以计算条件数的估计值。这可用于检测解中的数值稳定性问题，并强制使用最小范数解。但是，对于窄带，三角或对角矩阵，计算条件数的成本很高，实际上可能超过分解矩阵的成本。因此，在这些情况下不会计算条件编号，在带状矩阵的情况下，Octave依靠更简单的技术来检测奇异矩阵或基础的<small>LAPACK</small>代码。

trans-unit.source: All of these classes inherit from the Sparse<T> template class, and so all have similar capabilities and usage. The Sparse<T> class was based on Octave’s Array<T> class and users familiar with Octave’s Array classes will be comfortable with the use of the sparse classes.
trans-unit.target: 所有这些类都继承自 Sparse<T> 模板类，因此都具有相似的功能和用法。该 Sparse<T> 类是基于倍频的 Array<T> 类和用户熟悉倍频的 Array 类将舒适与使用稀疏类。

In case of a multipage image, the size of the 4th dimension must also match and the third dimension must be a singleton. By default, image will be completely opaque.

trans-unit.source: Also exploit broadcasting in these elementwise operators both to avoid looping and unnecessary intermediate memory allocations. See Broadcasting.

trans-unit.source: Also, a diagonal matrix <var>D</var> can be multiplied or divided by a scalar, or raised to a scalar power if it is square, producing diagonal matrix result in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 同样，对角矩阵 <var>D</var> 可以乘以标量或除以标量，或者如果对角矩阵D是正方形，则可以提高到标量幂，从而在所有情况下都产生对角矩阵结果。

trans-unit.source: Also, the test for positive definiteness is a low-cost test for a Hermitian matrix with a real positive diagonal. This does not guarantee that the matrix is positive definite, but only that it is a probable candidate. When such a matrix is factorized, a Cholesky factorization is first attempted, and if that fails the matrix is then treated with an LU factorization. Once the matrix has been factorized, matrix_type will return the correct classification of the matrix.
trans-unit.target: 同样，对正定性的检验是对带实正对角线的Hermitian矩阵的低成本检验。这不能保证矩阵是正定的，而只能保证矩阵是可能的候选。对这样的矩阵进行分解时，首先尝试进行Cholesky分解，如果失败，则使用LU分解对矩阵进行处理。矩阵分解后， matrix_type 将返回矩阵的正确分类。

trans-unit.source: Although Octave does not automatically report an error if you call a function with more arguments than expected, doing so probably indicates that something is wrong. Octave also does not automatically report an error if a function is called with too few arguments, but any attempt to use a variable that has not been given a value will result in an error. To avoid such problems and to provide useful messages, we check for both possibilities and issue our own error message.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Octave不会在调用一个参数多于预期的函数时自动报错,但这样做很可能说明有问题。如果调用的函数参数太少,Octave也不会自动报错,但任何使用未给定值的变量的尝试都会导致错误。为了避免这样的问题,并提供有用的信息,我们检查这两种可能性,并发布我们自己的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Although Octave normally executes commands from script files that have the name
trans-unit.target: 虽然Octave通常会执行来自脚本文件的命令,这些脚本文件的名称是

trans-unit.source: Although Octave uses a compressed column format, it should be noted that compressed row formats are equally possible. However, in the context of mixed operations between mixed sparse and dense matrices, it makes sense that the elements of the sparse matrices are in the same order as the dense matrices. Octave stores dense matrices in column major ordering, and so sparse matrices are equally stored in this manner.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Octave使用的是压缩列格式,但需要注意的是,压缩行格式也同样可以。但是,在混合稀疏矩阵和密集矩阵混合运算的情况下,稀疏矩阵的元素与密集矩阵的顺序相同是合理的。Octave以列主序存储密集矩阵,因此稀疏矩阵同样以这种方式存储。

trans-unit.source: Although a range constant specifies a row vector, Octave does not normally convert range constants to vectors unless it is necessary to do so. This allows you to write a constant like 1 : 10000 without using 80,000 bytes of storage on a typical 32-bit workstation.
trans-unit.target: 尽管范围常数指定了行向量，但是Octave通常不会将范围常数转换为向量，除非有必要这样做。这样，您就可以在不使用典型32位工作站上80,000字节存储空间的情况下编写 1 : 10000 类的常量。

trans-unit.source: Although accepted, the argument <var>-completenames</var> is silently ignored. Octave always returns absolute filenames.
trans-unit.target: 尽管已接受参数 <var>-completenames</var> ,但它会被静默忽略。八度总是返回绝对文件名。

trans-unit.source: Although default values may be set for any object, they are set in parent objects and apply to child objects, of the specified object type. For example, setting the default color property of line objects to "green", for the root object, will result in all line objects inheriting the color"green" as the default value.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以为任何对象设置默认值，但是它们在指定对象类型的父对象中设置并应用于子对象。例如，将 line 对象的默认 color 属性设置为 root 对象的 "green" ，将导致所有 line 对象继承 color "green" 作为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Although it is possible to put comment lines into keyboard-composed, throw-away Octave programs, it usually isn’t very useful because the purpose of a comment is to help you or another person understand the program at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以将注释行放入由键盘组成的一次性Octave程序中，但是它通常不是很有用，因为注释的目的是帮助您或其他人稍后理解该程序。

trans-unit.source: Although it is possible to rewrite all for loops as while loops, the Octave language has both statements because often a for loop is both less work to type and more natural to think of. Counting the number of iterations is very common in loops and it can be easier to think of this counting as part of looping rather than as something to do inside the loop.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以将所有的 for 循环重写为 while 循环，但是Octave语言同时具有这两种语句，因为通常 for 循环的工作量较小，而且想起来也很自然。计算循环中的迭代次数是很常见的，将计数视为循环的一部分而不是在循环内部进行操作会更容易。

trans-unit.target: 尽管这与Octave的词法分析器的正常行为不一致，后者通常倾向于通过在任意给定点上选择尽可能长的匹配项来将输入分解为令牌，但在这种情况下它更有用。

trans-unit.source: Always include a plus or minus sign in the result.
trans-unit.target: 始终在结果中包含一个加号或减号。

trans-unit.source: Always include a proper bug report for the problem you think you have fixed. We need to convince ourselves that the change is right before installing it. Even if it is right, we might have trouble judging it if we don’t have a way to reproduce the problem.
trans-unit.target: 始终针对您认为已解决的问题提供适当的错误报告。我们需要说服自己，更改才是正确的，然后再安装。即使是正确的，但是如果我们没有办法重现问题，我们可能会很难判断。

trans-unit.source: An additional input argument thres, that defines the pivoting threshold can be given. thres can be a scalar, in which case it defines the UMFPACK pivoting tolerance for both symmetric and unsymmetric cases. If thres is a 2-element vector, then the first element defines the pivoting tolerance for the unsymmetric UMFPACK pivoting strategy and the second for the symmetric strategy. By default, the values defined by spparms are used ([0.1, 0.001]).
trans-unit.target: 可以提供定义枢轴阈值的附加输入参数 thres 。 thres 可以是标量，在这种情况下，它定义了对称和不对称情况下的UMFPACK枢轴公差。如果 thres 是2元素向量，则第一个元素定义非对称UMFPACK旋转策略的旋转公差，第二个元素定义对称策略的旋转公差。默认情况下，使用 spparms 定义的值（[ 0.1，0.001 ]）。

trans-unit.source: An explicit conversion to a full matrix can be requested using the built-in function full. It should also be noted that the diagonal and permutation matrix objects will cache the result of the conversion after it is first requested (explicitly or implicitly), so that subsequent conversions will be very cheap.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用内置函数full显式转换为完整矩阵。还应注意，对角矩阵和置换矩阵对象将在首次（显式或隐式）请求转换结果后对其进行缓存，因此后续转换将非常便宜。

trans-unit.source: An expression can serve as a statement on its own. Most other kinds of statements contain one or more expressions which specify data to be operated on. As in other languages, expressions in Octave include variables, array references, constants, and function calls, as well as combinations of these with various operators.
trans-unit.target: 一个表达式可以单独作为一个语句。大多数其他类型的语句都包含一个或多个表达式,这些表达式指定了要操作的数据。和其他语言一样,Octave中的表达式包括变量、数组引用、常量和函数调用,以及这些变量与各种运算符的组合。

trans-unit.source: An important use of the Delaunay tessellation is that it can be used to interpolate from scattered data to an arbitrary set of points. To do this the N-simplex of the known set of points is calculated with delaunay or delaunayn. Then the simplices in to which the desired points are found are identified. Finally the vertices of the simplices are used to interpolate to the desired points. The functions that perform this interpolation are griddata, griddata3 and griddatan.
trans-unit.target: Delaunay细分的一个重要用途是可以用于将分散的数据插值到任意点集。为此，使用 delaunay 或 delaunayn 计算已知点集的N-单形。然后，识别出在其中找到所需点的单纯形。最后，将单纯形的顶点插值到所需的点。执行此插值的函数是 griddata ， griddata3 和 griddatan 。

trans-unit.source: An index expression consists of a set of parentheses enclosing M expressions separated by commas. Each individual index value, or component, is used for the respective dimension of the object that it is applied to. In other words, the first index component is used for the first dimension (rows) of the object, the second index component is used for the second dimension (columns) of the object, and so on. The number of index components M defines the dimensionality of the index expression. An index with two components would be referred to as a 2-D index because it has two dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 索引表达式由一组括号组成，这些括号包含用逗号分隔的M个表达式。每个单独的索引值或分量都用于对其应用到的对象的相应尺寸。换句话说，第一索引分量用于对象的第一维度（行），第二索引分量用于对象的第二维度（列），依此类推。索引分量的数量M定义了索引表达式的维数。具有两个分量的索引将被称为2-D索引，因为它具有两个维度。

trans-unit.source: An indexed image consists of an M-by-N matrix of integers and a C-by-3 color map. Each integer corresponds to an index in the color map, and each row in the color map corresponds to an RGB color. The color map must be of class double with values between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 索引图像由整数的M×N矩阵和C×3色图组成。每个整数对应于颜色图中的索引，并且颜色图中的每一行对应于RGB颜色。颜色图必须是 double 类，其值在0到1之间。

trans-unit.source: An indicator of convergence. 0 indicates that the iteration count was exceeded, and therefore convergence was not reached; >0 indicates that the algorithm converged. (The algorithm is stable and will converge given enough iterations.)
trans-unit.target: 趋同指标。0表示已超过迭代次数，因此未达到收敛；> 0表示算法已收敛。（该算法稳定，并且在进行足够的迭代后会收敛。）

trans-unit.source: An inequality with a lower bound (A(i,:)*x >= b(i)).

trans-unit.source: An optional decimal integer specifying the minimum field width. If the normal conversion produces fewer characters than this, the field is padded with spaces to the specified width. This is a minimum value; if the normal conversion produces more characters than this, the field is not truncated. Normally, the output is right-justified within the field.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的十进制整数，指定最小字段宽度。如果普通转换产生的字符少于此字符，则将字段填充为指定宽度的字段。这是最小值。如果普通转换产生的字符超过此数目，则该字段不会被截断。通常，输出在该字段内是右对齐的。

trans-unit.source: An optional decimal integer that specifies the maximum field width. Reading of characters from the input stream stops either when this maximum is reached or when a non-matching character is found, whichever happens first. Most conversions discard initial whitespace characters, and these discarded characters don’t count towards the maximum field width. Conversions that do not discard initial whitespace are explicitly documented.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的十进制整数，指定最大字段宽度。当达到此最大值或发现不匹配的字符时（以先发生者为准），将停止从输入流中读取字符。大多数转换会丢弃初始空白字符，并且这些丢弃的字符不会计入最大字段宽度。明确记录不放弃初始空格的转换。

trans-unit.source: An optional directory containing files that will be added to the Octave EXEC_PATH when the package is loaded. This might contain external scripts, etc., called by functions within the package.
trans-unit.target: 可选目录，其中包含在加载程序包时将添加到Octave EXEC_PATH 的文件。它可能包含由程序包中的函数调用的外部脚本等。

trans-unit.source: An optional field with the column number at which the error occurred
trans-unit.target: 可选字段,包含发生错误的列号。

trans-unit.source: An optional file that includes commands that are run when the package is added to the users path. Note that PKG_ADD directives in the source code of the package will also be added to this file by the Octave package manager. Note that symbolic links are to be avoided in packages, as symbolic links do not exist on some file systems, and so a typical use for this file is the replacement of the symbolic link
trans-unit.target: 可选文件，其中包含将程序包添加到用户路径时运行的命令。请注意，程序包源代码中的 PKG_ADD 指令也将由Octave程序包管理器添加到此文件中。请注意，在软件包中应避免使用符号链接，因为某些文件系统上不存在符号链接，因此该文件的典型用法是替换符号链接

trans-unit.source: An optional file that includes commands that are run when the package is removed from the users path. Note that PKG_DEL directives in the source code of the package will also be added to this file by the Octave package manager. See PKG_ADD and PKG_DEL Directives, for details on PKG_DEL directives.
trans-unit.target: 可选文件，包括从用户路径中删除软件包时运行的命令。请注意，程序包源代码中的 PKG_DEL 指令也将由Octave程序包管理器添加到此文件中。有关PKG_DEL指令的详细信息，请参见PKG_ADD和 PKG_DEL 指令。

trans-unit.source: An optional final argument, which must be a string or cell array of strings, contains options passed to the underlying qhull command. See the documentation for the Qhull library for details http://www.qhull.org/html/qh-quick.htm#options. The default option is {"Qt"}.
trans-unit.target: 可选的最终参数（必须是字符串或字符串单元格数组）包含传递给基础qhull命令的选项。有关详细信息，请参见Qhull库的文档http://www.qhull.org/html/qh-quick.htm#options。默认选项为 {"Qt"} 。

trans-unit.source: An optional final argument, which must be a string or cell array of strings, contains options passed to the underlying qhull command. See the documentation for the Qhull library for details http://www.qhull.org/html/qh-quick.htm#options. The default options are {"Qt", "Qbb", "Qc", "Qz"}.
trans-unit.target: 可选的最终参数（必须是字符串或字符串单元格数组）包含传递给基础qhull命令的选项。有关详细信息，请参见Qhull库的文档http://www.qhull.org/html/qh-quick.htm#options。默认选项为 {"Qt", "Qbb", "Qc", "Qz"} 。

trans-unit.source: An optional range specification can be used to list only a portion of the file. The special keyword "end" is a valid line number specification for the last line of the file.

trans-unit.source: An optional sixth argument specifies the specular exponent (spread) <var>se</var>. If not given, <var>se</var> defaults to 10.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第六个参数指定镜面指数（展宽） <var>se</var> 。如果未给出，则 <var>se</var> 默认为10。

trans-unit.source: An optional structure containing the following parameter(s) used to define the behavior of the solver. Missing elements in the structure take on default values, so you only need to set the elements that you wish to change from the default.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含以下参数的可选结构,用于定义求解器的行为。结构中缺失的元素采用默认值,所以只需要设置你想改变默认值的元素。

trans-unit.source: An optional third argument "enable" or "disable" is accepted but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第三个参数 "enable" 或 "disable" 被接受但被忽略。

trans-unit.source: An optional timeout can be specified using the property "timeout". This timeout value is the number of seconds to wait for the condition to be true. timeout must be at least 1. If a smaller value is specified, a warning is issued and a value of 1 is used instead. If the timeout value is not an integer, it is truncated towards 0.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用属性 "timeout" 来指定可选的超时时间。此超时值是等待条件为真的秒数。 timeout 必须至少为1。如果指定了较小的值，则会发出警告，并使用值1代替。如果超时值不是整数，则将其截断为0。

trans-unit.source: An optional type modifier character. This character is ignored by Octave’s scanf function, but is recognized to provide compatibility with the C language scanf.
trans-unit.target: 可选的类型修饰符。Octave的 scanf 函数将忽略此字符，但可以识别该字符以提供与C语言 scanf 的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: An scalar value containing the relative menu position. The entry with the lowest value is at the first position starting from left or top.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含相对菜单位置的标量值。值最小的条目位于从左边或顶部开始的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: An un-typed property. This kind of property can hold any octave value. <var>args</var> contains the default value.
trans-unit.target: 无类型的属性。这种属性可以保存任何八度值。 <var>args</var> 包含默认值。
